feed.noPosts: Looks like there aren't any posts yet. Be the first to share your culinary adventure!

post.upload: Upload photos from your recent restaurant visit
post.uploadDescription: Whether it's your meal, the restaurant's unique vibe, or memories made at the table, we want to see it all.
post.imageUploadIssue: There was an issue uploading images.
post.atLeastOneImage: Please upload at least one image before proceeding.
post.postCreationIssue: There was an error creating your post. Please try again.

explore.searchTip: Spell the username correctly for accurate results.
explore.ownProfileSearch: You cannot search for your own profile.
explore.noFoodies: No foodies in the area yet

profile.refreshError: Failed to refresh profile. Please try again.
profile.imageError: Failed to upload image. Please try again
profile.cameraPermission: Sorry, we need camera roll permissions to make this work!

accountSettings.logoutAlert: Are you sure you want to log out?
accountSettings.logoutErrorMessage: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.
accountSettings.deactivateError: No user is logged in or email is unavailable.
accountSettings.passwordConfirm: Please enter your password to confirm account deletion.
accountSettings.deactivateMessage: Your account, posts, comments, likes, and followings will be permanently deleted. This cannot be undone.
accountSettings.deactivateFail: Failed to delete your account. Please try again.

editProfile.noUser: No user found. Please login again.
editProfile.firstNameError: First name is required and can only contain letters.
editProfile.phoneError: Please enter a valid phone number with digits only.
editProfile.updateError: Failed to save your details. Please try again.
editProfile.description: Your name and bio will be visible to others. Choosing a location personalizes your feed. Your phone number will only be used for account verification later.

notificationSettings.description: Our app sends notifications to keep you updated on your friend’s recommendations and the status of your posts, ensuring you don’t miss anything relevant.

privacySettings.description: Our app uses your location to provide tailored recommendations and improve your experience by showing you relevant content. We use your photos to create a profile picture and to help you share your experiences with the community.

reportBug.fillError: Please fill in both the title and description.
reportBug.success: Thank you for improving the app!
reportBug.description: Reporting a bug helps us quickly fix issues and improve the app's performance for a smoother experience. Your feedback makes a big difference in keeping the app running well for you and others!
reportBug.title: Title
reportBug.bugMessage: let us know how the issue occurred

requestFeature.fillError: Please fill in both the name and reason
requestFeature.description: Got an idea to make the app better? Let us know! Your suggestions help shape future updates,bringing features that matter most to you and enhancing the overall experience for everyone.
requestFeature.reasonMessage: let us know how this feature would make your experience better
